name: Organizational Unit
title: Organizational Unit
description: The base template for an organization. Can be used to group together other entities to represent departments, committees, groups, or even entire organizations.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the organizational unit

attributes.name: avatar
attributes.description: A URL to an image used as an avatar or logo

attributes.name: display
attributes.description: A canonical display name for the ENS name; this MUST match the ENS name when its case is folded, and clients should ignore this value if it does not (e.g. "ricmoo.eth" could set this to "RicMoo.eth")

attributes.name: keywords
attributes.description: A list of comma-separated keywords, ordered by most significant first; clients that interpresent this field may choose a threshold beyond which to ignore

attributes.name: phone
attributes.description: A phone number as an E.164 string

keywords.name: keywords
keywords.description: A list of comma-separated keywords, ordered by most significant first; clients that interpresent this field may choose a threshold beyond which to ignore

phone.name: phone
phone.description: A phone number as an E.164 string
